name: Burger
description: Juicy burger with fresh lettuce, tomato, and cheese, served on a toasted bun.

name: Pizza
description: Delicious cheese pizza topped with fresh ingredients and baked to perfection.

name: Pasta
description: Rich and creamy pasta dish served with a flavorful sauce and garnished with herbs.

name: Salad
description: Fresh garden salad with mixed greens, cherry tomatoes, cucumbers, and a light dressing.

name: Ice Cream
description: Smooth and creamy ice cream in a variety of flavors, perfect for a sweet treat.

name: Cake
description: Decadent layered cake with rich frosting, perfect for celebrations.

name: Sandwich
description: Hearty sandwich filled with your choice of meats, cheeses, and fresh vegetables.

name: Fries
description: Crispy golden fries, seasoned to perfection, a classic side for any meal.
